summary: Completed testing of two critical fixes in Chat Message page: (1) Predict button styling enhanced from text-[8px] to text-[11px] font-bold px-4 py-1.5 rounded-full with shadow-sm and stronger colors, (2) Send button and + button now have onMouseDown/onTouchStart preventDefault to prevent mobile keyboard closure
passed_tests: Backend health check returns healthy (100% success rate on 17 API tests)

Send button (chat-send-btn) has onMouseDown preventDefault (verified in code at line 1205)
Send button (chat-send-btn) has onTouchStart preventDefault (verified in code at line 1206)
